description: Late 16th century borrowing from French tonsille or Latin tonsillae (“the tonsils in the throat”, plural).

entries.meaning: (anatomy, immunology) Any of various small masses of lymphoid tissues.
examples: Hyponyms: adenoid, faucial tonsil, lingual tonsil, Luschka's tonsil, nasopharyngeal tonsil, palatine tonsil, pharyngeal tonsil, third tonsil
